latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Food worker observed in soiled outer garments hair nets observed not being used at time of inspection where required
Appropriate methods to maintain food prep area free of pests was not provided or maintained at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Food worker observed in soiled outer garments hair nets observed not being used at time of inspection where required
Appropriate methods to maintain food prep area free of pests was not provided or maintained at time of inspection
At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient number of toilets and sinks for the number of children in attendance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
At the time of inspection child care service was observed providing hair brushes and cloth towels for use by children
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection
